The comprehensive, student-curated guide to

Design at Berkeley

Get started

Design is more than how something looks. It's how it works. Discover the diverse range of design disciplines and how you can apply design thinking to any field of interest.

Learn more

Get involved on campus

Whether you're new to design or an experienced pro,
you can always discover more ways to hone your skills.

Take Classes

Find classes to further your design education.

Join Clubs

Meet passionate peers and expand your portfolio through project.

Come to Council

Become a student leader in design and help make an impact.

Find more opportunities
